quiz.answer: Implementing number conservation measures like pooling

quiz.answer: International telephone number format and length

quiz.question: Which country uses the unusual country code +388 previously assigned for a European experiment?
options: It was a European Union shared code for cross-border services
quiz.answer: It was a European Union shared code for cross-border services
